Package arcade.vis

Class Drawer

java.lang.Object
arcade.vis.Drawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgentDrawer2D, AuxDrawer2D, EnvDrawer2D
public abstract class Drawer
extends java.lang.Object
implements sim.engine.Steppable
Visualization for Grid and Lattice objects.

Drawer objects convert Grid and Lattice objects into MASON Portrayals, which can then be displayed.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.3.0
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Drawer

      Drawer​(Panel panel, java.lang.String name, int length, int width, int depth, sim.util.gui.ColorMap map, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double bounds)
      Creates a Drawer and attaches it to the panel.
      Parameters:
      panel - the panel the drawer is attached to
      name - the name of the drawer
      length - the length of array (x direction)
      width - the width of array (y direction)
      depth - the depth of array (z direction)
      map - the color map for the array
      bounds - the size of the drawer within the panel

    • expandTri

      private static void expandTri​(double[][] arr, int i, int j, double val)
      Draws a triangle for a given location with the given value.
      Parameters:
      arr - the target array
      i - the coordinate of the triangle in the x direction
      j - the coordinate of the triangle in the y direction
      val - the value for the triangle
